name: Dinner Tonight: Mediterranean Tuna Salad on Focaccia
description: [Photographs: Nick Kindelsperger] I've been thinking about tuna and artichoke sandwiches ever since I sampled one from Chicago's Red Hen Bread for my Standing Room Only column. I tend to brown bag tuna salad sandwiches weekly, and yet this one...
recipeIngredient: 1/4 red bell pepper, stemmed, seeded, and chopped
3/8 cup kalamata olive, seeds removed, sliced thinly

recipeInstructions.text: Mix together all of the ingredients except the salt, pepper, and focaccia. Mash the tuna up with the back of a fork. Season mixture with salt and pepper to taste. Place half of the mixture on one slice of focaccia and top with another slice. Repeat and serve.
